snippet: In occupied France, Ms. Waren, who danced as Nazis sat in her audience, hid her identity and helped to hide other Jews and to smuggle weapons to the resistance.
abstract: Florence Waren, Jewish dancer who resisted the Nazis during World War II, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: In occupied France, Ms. Waren, who danced as Nazis sat in her audience, hid her identity and helped to hide other Jews and to smuggle weapons to the resistance.

headline.seo: Florence Waren, Dancer Who Resisted Nazis, Dies at 95
headline.main: Florence Waren, Jewish Dancer Who Resisted Nazis, Dies at 95
headline.print_headline: Florence Waren, 95, Jewish Dancer Who Resisted Nazis
